text: First, you plant your seed in a green house when it germinates, you transfer in the shamba. sents:
First, you plant your seed in a green house when it germinates, you transfer in the shamba.
When planting, dig a hole of abt 2cm, put in fertilizer then plant your tomatoes, after that unadungilia vijiti karibu kwa kila shimo la tomato ambapo inapokua, inakolea juu. kama hakuna mvua, unanyunyuzia maji.
